mapper.insert: insert into item_info (cat_name, num_iid, title, pict_url, small_images, reserve_price, zk_final_price, user_type, provcity, item_url, seller_id, volume, nick, cat_leaf_name, is_prepay, shop_dsr, ratesum, i_rfd_rate, h_good_rate, h_pay_rate30, free_shipment, material_lib_type, presale_discount_fee_text, presale_tail_end_time, presale_tail_start_time, presale_end_time, presale_start_time, presale_deposit, ju_play_end_time, ju_play_start_time, play_info, tmall_play_activity_end_time, tmall_play_activity_start_time ) values (#{catName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numIid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smallImages,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reservePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zkFinalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{provcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catLeafName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPrepay,jdbcType=BIT}, #{shopDsr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ratesum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{iRfdRate,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hGoodRate,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hPayRate30,jdbcType=BIT}, #{freeShipment,jdbcType=BIT}, #{materialLibType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{presaleDiscountFeeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{presaleTailEndTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{presaleTailStartTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{presaleEndTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{presaleStartTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{presaleDeposit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{juPlayEndTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{juPlayStartTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{playInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmallPlayActivityEndTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tmallPlayActivityStartTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.select: select cat_name, num_iid, title, pict_url, small_images, reserve_price, zk_final_price, user_type, provcity, item_url, seller_id, volume, nick, cat_leaf_name, is_prepay, shop_dsr, ratesum, i_rfd_rate, h_good_rate, h_pay_rate30, free_shipment, material_lib_type, presale_discount_fee_text, presale_tail_end_time, presale_tail_start_time, presale_end_time, presale_start_time, presale_deposit, ju_play_end_time, ju_play_start_time, play_info, tmall_play_activity_end_time, tmall_play_activity_start_time from item_info
